recipe.title: Sausage Casserole
recipe.ingredients: 5 vegan sausages (Plant Pioneer Chorizo Shroomdogs) ½ tablespoon oil 1 large red onion, diced 2 garlic cloves, chopped 100g kale 3 carrots, sliced 4 tomatoes, quartered 400g can, chopped tomatoes 1 tablespoon tomato puree 150mL vegetable stock ½ teaspoon smoked paprika 1 teaspoon dried rosemary 400g can butter beans Mashed potato, to serve

method.step: Cook vegan sausages as per package instructions (while they are cooking, you can prep your ingredients)
Heat the oil in the casserole pan (pressure cooker), add diced onion and fry over medium-low heat for 5-10 minutes, until soft and golden

Add the garlic, carrots, kale, fresh and canned tomatoes and tomato puree, vegetable stock, paprika and rosemary and stir all the ingredients together well. Cut the cooked sausages into bite-sized pieces and add these to the casserole too.
Place the lid on the casserole and transfer to the oven (put lid on pressure cooker)
Cook for 15 minutes, then stir in the butter beans, replace the lid and return to heat. Cook for a further 15 minutes until everything is cooked through and smells amazing!
Serve with mashed potatoes (we added rosemary to this too)
